name: Brave Froggo
description:
This project has been made for Mini Jam 79 with the theme FROGS and limitation - ONE LEVEL ONLY.

Control:

Arrow Keys or others (you will find out)

Tab: To Respawn the player if stuck

This is the story of a frog who goes in a cave to get potion for his friend to heal.

The game requires precise control.

The last level of game might frustrate you and seem impossible to some. 

Do comment if you are able to finish it.

Good Luck
